message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's an exclusive opportunity tailored to meet your needs and expectations. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I propose a price of $12000 for you to consider. This offer is valid for the next 3 rounds. Let me know if you need more information or if there's anything else I can assist you with.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the exclusivity and value of your product. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. To ensure we find a mutually beneficial solution, I am proposing a counteroffer of $11500 for the product. This price reflects the value I place on the transaction and the exclusivity of the product. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations. Let me know if you require further details or have any concerns.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Alice. After evaluating the situation, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10500 for the product.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. I've carefully considered your offer and would like to present a counteroffer of $11000 for the product. This price reflects a compromise that takes into account both the value of the product and your interest in acquiring it. I believe this offers a fair solution for both parties involved. Please let me know if you need any additional information or clarification.
Thank you for your effort, Alice. After considering your latest offer, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10750 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your continued interest in our product. In light of your proposal, I would like to extend a counteroffer of $10900 for the product. This price aims to strike a balance between the value we place on the product and your budgetary considerations. I hope this offer meets your expectations and facilitates a successful transaction.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10600 for the product.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. I've given it careful consideration and would like to offer a counterproposal of $10750 for the product. This price reflects a compromise that takes into account the value of the product and your financial constraints. I believe this offers a fair solution for both parties. Please let me know if you require any further details or have any concerns.
Thank you for your efforts, Alice. After thorough consideration, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $10500 for the product.
